response.overview: A social drama that revolves around the subject of drug dealers who are stationed outside the doors of schools and various educational institutions, which results in the addiction of young people, especially those from well-to-do families, which negatively affects their educational future, and in return, how these families deal with the reality of their childrenâ€™s addiction. In this context, the tape depicts how these young men disdain teachers in the classroom.
response.title: Casa Overdose 2021
